description: Enjoy winter in the city with the fleecy Whitehorn Down Jacket. Large down chambers give the Whitehorn a modern look, and recycled down filling from Re:Down® keeps you reliably warm. The main material, made from recycled Pertex™ Quantum, is water-repellent thanks to its PFC-free DWR treatment – so you stay dry during short rain showers. The sustainably produced Whitehorn Down Jacket is warm, cozy and extremely light – perfect for the way to work, traveling and walks on frosty days.
name: Mammut Whitehorn IN Jacket - Mens
